TEXT.TITLE: VALLEY FEDERAL <VFED> SPLITS STOCK TWO-FOR-ONE
TEXT.BODY: Valley Federal Savings and Loan Association said its board declared a two-for-one stock split for its common stock. The split will be effected in the form of a 100 pct stock dividend, to be issued April 30 to stockholders of record March 31. Reuter
